body: This can be one of two things, one that this is an illusion of such an high level that Evileye can't detect, or it is Pandora's Actor (Doppelganger class) who has became a human to have sex.
For those who don't understand. That is not Ainz, that is actually Pandora Actor who dress as Momoga. Also Pandora and can transform into anything due to his ability, that includes human.
Excuse me da fack ainz not human
